# Project SDK Docs

- [MSBuild properties for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Desktop](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/project-sdk/msbuild-props-desktop.md): Reference for the MSBuild properties and items that are understood by the .NET Desktop SDK, which includes WPF and WinForms.
- [MSBuild properties for Microsoft.NET.Sdk](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/project-sdk/msbuild-props.md): Reference for the MSBuild properties and items that are understood by the .NET SDK.
- [.NET project SDK overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/project-sdk/overview.md): Learn about the .NET project SDKs.
